reviewText: My son saw the ad for this DVD on another Monster Jam DVD (Crash Madness 5). He really loves it very much and watches it repeatedly. Great buy for Monster Truck fans.

My son absolutely loves monster trucks. I was not able to take him to the monster truck show due to being deployed. However, I got this DVD for him and all was forgiven! He watches it, or asks to watch it, on a daily basis. The freestyle disc is his favorite.
We purchasd the DVD for our grandsons 5th birthday. He loves monster trucks and especially free style. This was the perfect gift for him. He watches it over and over, and enjoys it each time.
I have a 2yr old who loves Monster Trucks and this DVD is perfect! It's two DVD's with both racing and freestyle! He watches it for hours! It's great!
This was a gift for my 4 years-old boy and he gets very excited every time we see it. It's just great!!!
